message: Enhance changelog retrieval in nuvu_server.py by detecting the current git branch before fetching commit history. Update command to prioritize remote tracking branches, improving version detection accuracy. This change streamlines the process of obtaining the latest commit information for better frontend integration.

Enhance version tracking in OptimizerPanel.vue and ChangelogModal.vue by adding hash information for Nuvu and ComfyUI components. Update changelog links to prioritize hash values for better accuracy. Modify nuvu_server.py to retrieve and store commit hashes alongside tags for improved version detection. Remove obsolete JavaScript files and update import paths in nuvu.js to reflect recent changes.
Remove obsolete JavaScript files: auth-pil8uz3l.js and main-BYFDc9sq.js. Update import paths in nuvu.js to reflect changes in module structure.

Refactor version detection logic in ChangelogModal.vue to improve accuracy. Enhance matching criteria for current version by prioritizing hash checks, followed by tag comparisons, and fallback to short hash checks. Clean up version strings for consistent comparison.

Update changelog retrieval logic in nuvu_server.py to fetch the last 100 commits and improve version detection in the frontend. Enhance OptimizerPanel.vue and ChangelogModal.vue to display current version indicators and update changelog links. Remove obsolete JavaScript files and ensure consistent styling in the changelog modal.

Refactor version detection in nuvu_server.py to streamline fallback logic for backend version retrieval. Ensure accurate detection of installed versions using pip commands and improve error handling. Remove redundant checks and enhance clarity in version assignment for both backend and frontend components.

Refactor version detection logic in nuvu_server.py to improve accuracy. Implement checks for installed backend version and fallback mechanisms using pip and changelog.json. Enhance frontend version retrieval by detecting git tags and reading from changelog.json if necessary. Update handling of version defaults for better reliability.

Implement changelog generation in CI workflow and integrate changelog modal in the dashboard. Add API endpoint to fetch changelog data from changelog.json or git log. Update frontend components to display changelog links and modal for Nuvu and ComfyUI updates.

Enhance Windows installation script by adding a configurable port for ComfyUI and updating the helper launcher to use this port. Standardize capitalization of 'Nuvu' across various frontend components and backend logging for consistency. Remove obsolete JavaScript files from the Vue directory.

Update batch scripts to include '--no-warn-script-location' flag for pip installations, enhancing compatibility and reducing warnings. Standardize capitalization of 'Nuvu' in various components for consistency across the application.

Standardize capitalization of 'Nuvu' across various components and files, including loading messages and system info displays. Update references in the backend to ensure consistency in directory naming and logging. Handle user cancellation in installation processes gracefully.
Merge branch 'stg'
Update batch script and CI workflow to reflect renaming of 'nuvu-Compiled' to 'ComfyUI-Nuvu' and include 'windows_install_portable_nuvu.bat' in the build process.
Merge branch 'stg'

Standardize method names in dialog.js for Nuvu app integration, changing 'isnuvuAppMounted', 'mountnuvuApp', and 'setnuvuView' to 'isNuvuAppMounted', 'mountNuvuApp', and 'setNuvuView' for consistency.
Update import path in nuvu.js to reflect changes in main.js, switching from 'main-DEw3n8uv.js' to 'main-CAKph1xX.js' for consistency with recent refactoring.
Standardize method name in main.js by changing 'setnuvuAuthenticated' to 'setNuvuAuthenticated' for consistency with Nuvu app integration naming conventions.

Standardize method names in main.js and dialog.js for Nuvu app integration, changing 'mountnuvuApp', 'unmountnuvuApp', 'isnuvuAppMounted', 'getnuvuAppRef', and 'setnuvuView' to 'mountNuvuApp', 'unmountNuvuApp', 'isNuvuAppMounted', 'getNuvuAppRef', and 'setNuvuView', respectively. Update import statements in nuvu.js to reflect these changes.
Update repository references from TheArtOfficial to nuvulabs across all files, including installation scripts, documentation, and Docker configurations.
Refactor dialog.js to standardize method names for Nuvu app integration, changing 'isNuvuAppMounted' and 'mountNuvuApp' to 'isnuvuAppMounted' and 'mountnuvuApp', respectively.
Rename ComfyUI-Nitra to ComfyUI-Nuvu across all files and update related documentation. Remove obsolete Nitra files and adjust logging messages accordingly.
Initial Commit from ArtOfficial gh transition
